content:
ADL Specification Example

    Instruction set information:
    (OP_GROUP mult_ops
    (OPCODE mpy mpyi mpysp mpydp
    (OPERANDS src1 src2 dst)
    (SEMANTIC dst=src1*src2))
    (VAR_GROUPS
    (src1 : RF1 | RF2)
    (src2 : RF2)
    (dst : RF2))
    (INSTRUCTION
    (FU_SLOT_LIST
    (UNIT ALU1)
    (UNIT MULT)
    (UNIT ALU2)))
    ...

    Net-list information:
    (FUnit MULT
    (OPCODES mult_ops)
    (CONNECTIONS c1 c2 c3))
    (RegFile RF2
    (CONNECTIONS c2 c3 c4 c5 ….))
    (RegFile RF1
    ...
